name: Behind The Light 002
description: "Behind the light" is an attempt to take out the essence of the subject focusing in shape and in color while overexposing the image to create a white background or canvas. The technique acted as a self-imposed limiter at the time of taking photographs, by creating the white background and focusing on color and shape the pictures became simplified and ultimately stylised, watching the results I started feeling intrigued and interested by this simplified form of watching photography pushing me to do a whole series with the technique.
